page.title: 03CLUBS
page.content: Our village hall,the largest in the country,contains a social club,hall facilities for dances etc.,and a recently enlarged library.A thriving Community Association organises fetes and social events.Badminton and Keep Fit are popular for adults and dancing classes for youngsters.Senior citizens have their own social club.Spacious playing fields encourage football and cricket.There is a tennis club and a popular bowls club.The Congregational Church Hall is the venue for Brownies and regular discos for children.The scouts have their own wooden building and arrange several functions.A track for BMX bikes was laid last year and competitions take place.Many families travel to town for further sport,such as swimming,gym,judo and squash.A good neighbour club also provides advice and practical help.
